thread.title: BRIEF-GE Announces 2018 Board Slate, Includes 3 New Directors

title: BRIEF-GE Announces 2018 Board Slate, Includes 3 New Directors
text: 42 AM / in a minute BRIEF-GE Announces 2018 Board Slate, Includes 3 New Directors Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - General Electric Co: * GE ANNOUNCES 2018 BOARD OF DIRECTORS SLATE; INCLUDES THREE NEW DIRECTORS * NEW DIRECTORS INCLUDE H. LAWRENCE CULP JR., FORMER CEO AND PRESIDENT OF DANAHER CORP * NEW DIRECTORS INCLUDE THOMAS W. HORTON, FORMER CHAIRMAN AND CEO OF AMERICAN AIRLINES * NEW DIRECTORS INCLUDE LESLIE F. SEIDMAN, FORMER CHAIRMAN OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD (FASB) * NEW BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL CONSIST OF 12 DIRECTORS, INCLUDING THREE NEW CANDIDATES * JACK BRENNAN WILL STAY ON AS LEAD DIRECTOR TO FACILITATE TRANSITION TO A NEW LEAD DIRECTOR, NEW BOARD LEADERSHIP IN COMING YEAR​ * ‍JACK BRENNAN WILL NOT STAND FOR REELECTION IN 2019​ * NEW BOARD WILL BE CONSISTENT WITH CO‘S PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED PLAN TO REDUCE SIZE OF ITS BOARD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
